law.catch_line: The 24-hour toll free telephone access system provided by each health maintenance organization shall...
law.text:
The 24-hour toll free telephone access system provided by each health maintenance organization shall:
Enable members and providers to determine, with one telephone call, the primary care provider assigned to a member; and
Enable providers to determine, with one telephone call, the names of three contracted specialist providers for the health maintenance organization who also have staff privileges at a particular hospital in the State.
